name: xd-plugin-boilerplate-react
description: A simple XD plugin, built with the xd-webpack-starter-template package using React

scripts.build: npm run compile && xdpm package dist
scripts.debug:install: webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode development && xdpm install dist
scripts.debug:watch: xdpm watch dist | webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode development --watch

author: Ashwin Valento, Pablo Klaschka
